Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits certain public transportation authorities from procuring certain commuter vehicles which use fossil fuels
Summary: Prohibits public transportation authorities in regions with 500,000 or more residents from procuring certain commuter vehicles which use fossil fuels.
LawCode: Amd ยง2879, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting certain public transportation authorities from procuring certain commuter vehicles which use fossil fuels
